Comment: Imagine a French soldier circa 1942.  Did they deserve to live under Nazi occupation?  I don’t think the answer depends on how well or poorly they acted as a soldier.  France as a nation failed to defend themselves against invasion, and so they were invaded.    There are challenges that are bigger than what someone does as an individual, those challenges can only be met by a higher level of organization.  A town facing a rising river.  A region facing an infectious disease.  Humanity facing climate change.  We meet those challenges together, or we fail.  In 2024, America failed.
Author: NewMidwest
